name: UVREditorMode
doc: VR Editor Mode. Extends editor viewports with functionality for VR controls and object manipulation

InteractorClass: The controller to use when UnrealEd is in VR mode. Use VREditorInteractor get default editor behavior, or select a custom controller for special behavior
TeleporterClass: The teleporter to use when UnrealEd is in VR mode. Use VREditorTeleporter to get default editor behavior, or select a custom teleporter

methods.name: GetWorldScaleFactor
methods.doc: Gets the world scale factor, which can be multiplied by a scale vector to convert to room space

methods.name: IsInGameView
methods.doc: Returns whether game view is currently active.

methods.name: SetGameView
methods.doc: Display the scene more closely to how it would appear at runtime (as opposed to edit time).
